QuestData.Title: Cutting a Path
QuestData.Description: During our mission to reconnoiter the Sunhawks and their portal, I sustained a serious wound. Scout Loryi has managed to staunch the bleeding and she's trying to figure out a way to evacuate me to Blood Watch.$B$BThe problem is that we'd have to abandon our position here in order to guarantee a safe return.$B$BAs soon as we leave this consecrated ground, we'll be set upon by ravagers. If you can clear some of the enraged ravagers, it might allow us to make the trip back safely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Enraged Ravagers and return to Scout Jorli at Vindicator's Rest.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you managed to clear some of the ravagers in the area?
QuestData.RewardText: It looks a bit better out there, but I still wonder if I wouldn't be better off waiting for a medic here.
